Despite this minor annoyance, I do LOVE this device!
author: abcthatsme

review: I've been using FireTV Stick for about a week now and it's awesome! It was so easy to install and it works exactly as I expected. I am 100% immersed in the Amazon ecosystem so getting this device was a no-brainer for me. I can stream all my videos, music and photos flawlessly. I can watch my Netflix and YouTube with no major buffering or lagging issues. I can even play some of my favorite games on it. Very happy customer so far!My only very minor complaints would be that the remote control is extremely hard to open to replace the batteries and that the device still  can't be used in hotel rooms or any place that requires a webpage internet login. Amazon says it's coming soon, so hopefully they really do mean SOON. lol
